My Dharma relatives from the Jia family rowed a boat to invite me.
So on the twenty-first day of the twelfth month, I returned to my old residence at Fuquan.
At that time, there were still four volumes of the Collection of Essentials that had not been carved.
Thus, I wrote out the original text while sick.
I ordered the carvers to complete the work.

To spread the book Comprehensive Chronicle throughout the world.

Written by Zhipan on the Duanwu Festival, the Xinwei year of the Xianchun era (1280).
